contents.text: sens: specifies the sensitivity of the recognizer to determine whether speech is present. Lower sensitivity may be required for the recognizer to work well in the presence of high background noise or line echo.
contents.zh-CHS: sens：指定识别器确定是否存在语音的灵敏度。识别器可能需要较低的灵敏度才能在存在高背景噪声或线回波的情况下正常工作。

contents.text: starttimer: boolean value that defines whether the no input (noint) and no recognition (norect) are started initially. When set to false, the starttimer event must be received in order to start them. Default is "false".
contents.zh-CHS: starttimer：一个布尔值，定义最初是否启动无输入（noint）和无识别（norect）。设置为false时，必须接收starttimer事件才能启动它们。默认值为“false”。

contents.text: iterate: specifies the number of times the <grammar>, <noinput>, and <nomatch> elements may be executed unless those elements specify differently. The value "forever" may be used to indicate that these may be executed any number of times. Default is once '1'.
contents.zh-CHS: 迭代：指定可以执行<grammar>、<noinput>和<nomatch>元素的次数，除非这些元素以不同的方式指定。值“forever”可用于指示可执行任意次数。默认值为一次“1”。

contents.text: Events:
contents.zh-CHS: 活动：

contents.text: sens: sets the sensitivity of the recognizer as described above.
contents.zh-CHS: 传感器：如上所述设置识别器的灵敏度。

contents.text: starttimer: starts the no input (noint) and no recognition (norect) timers if they have not already been started. Has no effect otherwise.
contents.zh-CHS: starttimer：启动无输入（noint）和无识别（norect）计时器（如果尚未启动）。否则没有效果。

contents.text: terminate: terminates the speech input and assigns values to the shadow variables.
contents.zh-CHS: 终止：终止语音输入并为阴影变量赋值。

contents.text: Shadow Variables:
contents.zh-CHS: 阴影变量：

contents.text: speech.end: contains the event that caused the <speech> to terminate or is assigned one of "speech.match", "speech.noinput", or "speech.nomatch" depending upon which of the corresponding elements reached its maximum.
contents.zh-CHS: speech.end：包含导致<speech>终止的事件，或根据相应元素中达到最大值的元素，将其指定为“speech.match”、“speech.noinput”或“speech.nomatch”之一。

contents.text: speech.results: contains the results of a matched grammar. The results are formatted using the Natural Language Semantics Markup Language (NLSML) [n4]. When this variable is referenced to return results, the results are returned as a separate MIME entity.
contents.zh-CHS: speech.results：包含匹配语法的结果。使用自然语言语义标记语言（NLSML）[n4]对结果进行格式化。当引用此变量以返回结果时，结果将作为单独的MIME实体返回。

contents.text: The following sections describe the child elements of <speech>.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下各节介绍<speech>的子元素。

contents.text: The <grammar> element specifies and activates a speech grammar based on Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) [n3] XML notation. Grammars may be referenced by a URI or defined inline. Child elements of <match> MUST be executed when the specified speech grammar is matched.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素指定并激活基于语音识别语法规范（SRGS）[n3]XML表示法的语音语法。语法可以由URI引用或内联定义。当指定的语音语法匹配时，必须执行<match>的子元素。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: uri: specifies the location of an SRGS grammar when the grammar is not defined inline.
contents.zh-CHS: uri：指定未内联定义语法时SRGS语法的位置。

contents.text: iterate: specifies the number of times the <grammar> may be matched. The value "forever" MAY be used to indicate that <grammar> may be matched any number of times. This value overrides any specified in <speech>. Default is once '1'.
contents.zh-CHS: 迭代：指定可以匹配<grammar>的次数。值“forever”可用于指示<grammar>可匹配任意次数。此值覆盖<speech>中指定的任何值。默认值为一次“1”。

contents.text: <match> is a child of <grammar> and specifies the actions to take when the corresponding grammar is matched.
contents.zh-CHS: <match>是<grammar>的子级，指定匹配相应语法时要执行的操作。

contents.text: The <noinput> element is used when speech is being recognized. Children of the <noinput> element MUST be executed when speech has not been detected and the no input timeout (noint) occurs.
contents.zh-CHS: 在识别语音时使用<noinput>元素。当未检测到语音且无输入超时（noint）发生时，必须执行<noinput>元素的子元素。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: iterate: specifies the number of times the <noinput> may be triggered. The value "forever" may be used to indicate that <noinput> may be triggered any number of times. This value overrides any specified in <speech>. Default is once '1'.
contents.zh-CHS: 迭代：指定可以触发<noinput>的次数。值“forever”可用于指示<noinput>可被触发任意次数。此值覆盖<speech>中指定的任何值。默认值为一次“1”。

contents.text: The <nomatch> element is used when speech is being recognized. Children of the <nomatch> element MUST be executed when it is determined that none of the active grammars will match.
contents.zh-CHS: 识别语音时使用<nomatch>元素。当确定所有活动语法都不匹配时，必须执行<nomatch>元素的子元素。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: iterate: specifies the maximum number of times the <nomatch> may be triggered. The value "forever" MAY be used to indicate that <nomatch> may be triggered any number of times. This value overrides any specified in <speech>. Default is once '1'.
contents.zh-CHS: 迭代：指定可触发<nomatch>的最大次数。值“forever”（永久）可用于指示<nomatch>可被触发任意次数。此值覆盖<speech>中指定的任何值。默认值为一次“1”。

contents.text: 9.10.1.5. <speechexit>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.10.1.5. <speechexit>

contents.text: The <speechexit> element MUST be invoked when the speech input completes because one of <grammar>, <noinput>, or <nomatch> occurred its maximum number of times.
contents.zh-CHS: 语音输入完成时必须调用<speechexit>元素，因为<grammar>、<noinput>或<nomatch>中的一个出现的次数最大。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: none
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: The <play> element, as defined in the MSML Dialog Base Package, is extended with a new child element for synthesizing speech. From an XML perspective, <tts> is a member of a media substitution group. See the schema at the end of this document for details.
contents.zh-CHS: MSML对话框基本包中定义的<play>元素使用新的子元素进行扩展，用于合成语音。从XML的角度来看，<tts>是媒体替换组的成员。有关详细信息，请参阅本文档末尾的模式。

contents.text: The following sections describe the child elements of <play>.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下各节介绍了<play>的子元素。

contents.text: Contents of the <tts> element are rendered using text-to-speech services and must be compliant to the SSML specification [n11]. Element content MAY be plain text, contain the SSML <speak> element, or the uri attribute should identify the location of text to be rendered.
contents.zh-CHS: <tts>元素的内容使用文本到语音服务呈现，并且必须符合SSML规范[n11]。元素内容可以是纯文本，包含SSML<speak>元素，或者uri属性应该标识要呈现的文本的位置。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: uri: identifies the location of the text to be rendered. The file and http schemes are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: uri：标识要呈现的文本的位置。支持文件和http方案。

contents.text: iterate: specifies the number of times the text-to-speech block is to be rendered. Defaults to once '1'.
contents.zh-CHS: 迭代：指定文本到语音块的渲染次数。默认为一次“1”。

contents.text: xml:lang: specifies the language to use when it is not explicitly specified as an attribute for <speak>.
contents.zh-CHS: xml:lang：指定未明确指定为<speak>的属性时要使用的语言。

contents.text: 9.11. MSML Dialog Fax Detection Package
contents.zh-CHS: 9.11. MSML对话框传真检测包

contents.text: The Fax Detection Package defines primitives that allow a media server to provide facsimile detection services.
contents.zh-CHS: 传真检测包定义了允许媒体服务器提供传真检测服务的原语。

contents.text: 9.11.1. <faxdetect>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.11.1. <faxdetect>

contents.text: Fax tone detection is used to detect the presence of the T.30 Calling Tone (CNG) or Called Station Identification (CED) tone in a media stream. Child elements of <faxdetectexit> MUST be executed when a CNG tone is detected.
contents.zh-CHS: 传真音调检测用于检测媒体流中是否存在T.30主叫音调（CNG）或被叫站标识（CED）音调。当检测到CNG音调时，必须执行<faxdetectexit>的子元素。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: id: an optional identifier that may be referenced elsewhere for sending events to the faxdetect primitive.
contents.zh-CHS: id：可选标识符，可在别处引用，用于向faxdetect原语发送事件。

contents.text: Events:
contents.zh-CHS: 活动：

contents.text: terminate: terminates fax tone detection and assigns values to the associated shadow variables.
contents.zh-CHS: 终止：终止传真音检测并为相关的阴影变量赋值。

contents.text: Shadow Variables:
contents.zh-CHS: 阴影变量：

contents.text: faxdetect.tone: A string that specifies the fax tone type detected by the media server. Values supported SHOULD include "CED", "CNG", or empty string. The empty string MUST be used if fax tone detection terminated before detection of a fax tone, resulting in execution of the <faxdetectexit> element.
contents.zh-CHS: faxdetect.tone：指定媒体服务器检测到的传真音调类型的字符串。支持的值应包括“CED”、“CNG”或空字符串。如果在检测传真音之前终止传真音检测，导致执行<faxdetectexit>元素，则必须使用空字符串。

contents.text: faxdetect.end: A string value that specifies the reason for termination of <faxdetect>. Values supported SHOULD include "faxdetect.complete" (due to detection of CED or CNG tone), "faxdetect.failed.noresource" (failed due to lack of resources on the media server), "faxdetect.failed" (failed due to any other reason) "faxdetect.terminated" (terminated by <dialogend>), or undefined.
contents.zh-CHS: faxdetect.end：一个字符串值，指定终止<faxdetect>的原因。支持的值应包括“faxdetect.complete”（由于检测到CED或CNG音调）、“faxdetect.failed.noresource”（由于媒体服务器上缺少资源而失败）、“faxdetect.failed”（由于任何其他原因而失败）、“faxdetect.terminated”（由<dialogend>终止）或未定义。

contents.text: 9.11.2. <faxdetectexit>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.11.2. <faxdetectexit>

contents.text: The <faxdetectexit> element MUST be invoked when fax detection, invoked via <faxdetect>, terminates. Child elements of <faxdetectexit>, <send> and <exit>, allow events to be reported by the media server.
contents.zh-CHS: 当通过<faxdetect>调用的传真检测终止时，必须调用<faxdetectexit>元素。<faxdetectexit>、<send>和<exit>的子元素允许媒体服务器报告事件。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: none
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: 9.12. MSML Dialog Fax Send/Receive Package
contents.zh-CHS: 9.12. MSML对话框传真发送/接收包

contents.text: 9.12.1. <faxsend>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.12.1. <faxsend>

contents.text: The <faxsend> primitive provides the functionality of a calling fax terminal. This typically means sending a set of pages. However, it can also mean requesting the called terminal to send pages instead of, or in addition to, receiving pages. The fax images to send are defined by the <sendobj> elements, described below.
contents.zh-CHS: <faxsend>原语提供呼叫传真终端的功能。这通常意味着发送一组页面。然而，它也可以意味着请求被叫终端发送页面而不是接收页面，或者除了接收页面之外。要发送的传真图像由<sendobj>元素定义，如下所述。

contents.text: Requesting the called terminal to send pages happens when the <rxpoll> element is included as part of <faxsend>. This element may be included in addition to, or instead of, the <sendobj> element. One <sendobj> (at a minimum) or <rxpoll> element must be present. When both are present, a media server will first send pages and will then poll the other terminal, requesting pages.
contents.zh-CHS: 当<rxpoll>元素作为<faxsend>的一部分包含时，请求被调用的终端发送页面。该元素可以包括在<sendobj>元素之外，也可以代替<sendobj>元素。必须存在一个<sendobj>（至少）或<rxpoll>元素。当两者都存在时，媒体服务器将首先发送页面，然后轮询另一个终端，请求页面。

contents.text: Because fax is a distinct media type, the <faxsend> primitive is not expected to interact with other primitives. Rather, it will interact using fax protocols with a remote fax terminal (or gateway) and will send requested status events to its invoking environment. During fax operation, shadow variables are used to record the progress and parameters of the varying stages of fax operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于传真是一种独特的媒体类型，<faxsend>原语不应与其他原语交互。相反，它将使用传真协议与远程传真终端（或网关）进行交互，并将请求的状态事件发送到其调用环境。在传真操作期间，阴影变量用于记录传真操作不同阶段的进度和参数。

contents.text: Status events are requested by including one or more status request elements. These elements correspond to different stages or events in fax operation and cause predefined events to be sent to the invoking environment when they occur. Since the only recipient of these events is expected to be a fax control agent, requests are simplified by associating a predefined namelist of shadow variables with each event. This decision may be revisited to allowed tailored namelists based on further implementation experience. Status requests apply both to sending and polling operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过包含一个或多个状态请求元素来请求状态事件。这些元素对应于传真操作中的不同阶段或事件，并导致预定义事件在发生时发送到调用环境。由于预期这些事件的唯一接收者是传真控制代理，因此通过将阴影变量的预定义名称列表与每个事件关联，可以简化请求。根据进一步的实施经验，可重新考虑该决定，以允许定制名单。状态请求同时应用于发送和轮询操作。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: lclid: the identifier that a media server uses to identify itself.
contents.zh-CHS: lclid：媒体服务器用来标识自身的标识符。

contents.text: minspeed: the minimum acceptable speed to negotiate for the operation.
contents.zh-CHS: minspeed：操作协商的最小可接受速度。

contents.text: maxspeed: the maximum speed to negotiate for the operation. This attribute is primarily for testing purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: maxspeed：操作协商的最大速度。此属性主要用于测试目的。

contents.text: ecm: specifies whether Error Correction Mode (ECM) is allowed to be used if supported by the remote terminal. Defaults to "true".
contents.zh-CHS: ecm：指定如果远程终端支持，是否允许使用纠错模式（ecm）。默认为“true”。

contents.text: Events:
contents.zh-CHS: 活动：

contents.text: terminate: terminates the fax send operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 终止：终止传真发送操作。

contents.text: Shadow Variables:
contents.zh-CHS: 阴影变量：

contents.text: fax.rmtid: the identifier of the remote fax terminal.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.rmtid：远程传真终端的标识符。

contents.text: fax.rate: the negotiated speed for the operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 传真速率：操作的协商速度。

contents.text: fax.resolution: identifies the resolution of the image. Both metric- and inch-based resolutions are defined. Metric-based resolutions are 75x75, 150x150, 204x98, 204x196, 204x391, and 408x391. Inch-based resolutions are 200x200, 300x300, 400x400, and 600x600.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.resolution：标识图像的分辨率。定义了基于公制和英制的分辨率。基于公制的分辨率为75x75、150x150、204x98、204x196、204x391和408x391。基于英寸的分辨率为200x200、300x300、400x400和600x600。

contents.text: fax.pagesize: identifies the negotiated page size. Metric sizes are "A3", "A4", "A5", "A6", and "B4". Inch-based page sizes are "Letter" and "Legal".
contents.zh-CHS: fax.pagesize：标识协商的页面大小。公制尺寸为“A3”、“A4”、“A5”、“A6”和“B4”。基于英寸的页面大小为“字母”和“合法”。

contents.text: fax.encoding: identifies the image encoding utilized. Valid values are "MH", "R", "MMR", and "JPEG".
contents.zh-CHS: fax.encoding：标识使用的图像编码。有效值为“MH”、“R”、“MMR”和“JPEG”。

contents.text: fax.ecm: identifies whether ECM operation was used.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.ecm：标识是否使用了ecm操作。

contents.text: fax.pagebadlines: the number of bad lines in a page.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.pagebadlines：页面中错误行数。

contents.text: fax.objbadlines: the number of bad lines in an object.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.objbadlines：对象中的错误行数。

contents.text: fax.opbadlines: the number of bad lines in an operation.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.opbadlines：操作中的错误行数。

contents.text: fax.objuri: the objuri of the current object.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.objuri：当前对象的objuri。

contents.text: fax.resendcount: the number of pages resent due to errors.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.resendcount：由于错误而重新发送的页数。

contents.text: fax.totalpages: the number of pages processed or stored.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.totalpages：处理或存储的页数。

contents.text: fax.totalobjects: the count of the objects used in the operation.
contents.zh-CHS: fax.totalobjects：操作中使用的对象的计数。

contents.text: fax.duration: the duration of the operation expressed as a duration in seconds and milliseconds (e.g., "23s250ms").
contents.zh-CHS: fax.duration：操作的持续时间，以秒和毫秒表示（例如，“23s250ms”）。

contents.text: fax.result: contains the reason that caused the fax operation to complete. When the operation completes successfully, the value will be assigned "fax.success". Other values include "fax.partial", "fax.nofax", "fax.remotedisconnect", "fax.uri.access.error", and "fax.invalid.startpage".
contents.zh-CHS: fax.result：包含导致传真操作完成的原因。当操作成功完成时，该值将被分配为“fax.success”。其他值包括“fax.partial”、“fax.nofax”、“fax.remotedisconnect”、“fax.uri.access.error”和“fax.invalid.startpage”。

contents.text: The following sections describe the child elements of <faxsend>.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下各节介绍<faxsend>的子元素。

contents.text: <sendobj> is used to define a fax transmission. There MAY be multiple instances of the element, which will be transmitted in order.
contents.zh-CHS: <sendobj>用于定义传真传输。元素可能有多个实例，这些实例将按顺序传输。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: objuri: a URI that points to the fax image that will be transmitted. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: objuri：指向将要传输的传真图像的URI。强制性的

contents.text: startpage: the first page of a multi-page objuri to send.
contents.zh-CHS: 起始页：要发送的多页objuri的第一页。

contents.text: pagecount: page count.
contents.zh-CHS: 页面计数：页面计数。

contents.text: 9.12.1.2. <hdrfooter>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.12.1.2. <hdrfooter>

contents.text: <hdrfooter> describes the header/footer that a media server MAY put on pages. The header or footer may be defined as the content of the <format> child element. The <format> element is only allowed if the type attribute has a value of "header" or "footer".
contents.zh-CHS: <hdrfooter>描述媒体服务器可能在页面上放置的页眉/页脚。页眉或页脚可以定义为<format>子元素的内容。仅当type属性的值为“header”或“footer”时才允许使用<format>元素。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: type: specifies whether a header or a footer should be put on pages and identifies the source of the header or footer. The following enumerated values may be used:
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：指定是否应在页面上放置页眉或页脚，并标识页眉或页脚的来源。可以使用以下枚举值：

contents.text: "header" indicates that the media server should put a header on pages using the contents of the <format> element.
contents.zh-CHS: “header”表示媒体服务器应该使用<format>元素的内容在页面上放置一个header。

contents.text: "nohdr" indicates that there should be no header or footer.
contents.zh-CHS: “nohdr”表示不应该有页眉或页脚。

contents.text: "footer" indicates that the media server should put a footer on pages using the contents of the <format> element.
contents.zh-CHS: “footer”表示媒体服务器应使用<format>元素的内容在页面上放置一个页脚。

contents.text: style: defines the style of insertion onto a fax page that a media server should use for the header or footer. Valid styles are "append", "overlay", or "replace".
contents.zh-CHS: 样式：定义媒体服务器应用于页眉或页脚的传真页插入样式。有效样式为“附加”、“覆盖”或“替换”。

contents.text: <format> is a child of the <hdrfooter> element that defines the style format to be used for the header or footer. It uses a "C" language style format statement (as shown below) to define the contents and layout of the header or footer.
contents.zh-CHS: <format>是<hdrfooter>元素的子元素，该元素定义用于页眉或页脚的样式格式。它使用“C”语言样式的格式语句（如下所示）来定义页眉或页脚的内容和布局。

contents.text: code length name format %a 3 day of week 3-character abbreviation %d 2 date 01-31 %m 2 month 01-12 %y 2 year 00-99 %Y 4 year 0000-9999 %I 2 12 hour 01-12 %H 2 24 hour 00-23 %M 2 minute 00-59 %S 2 seconds 00-59 %p 2 AM/PM AM or PM %P 2 page number 01-99 %T 2 total pages 01-99 %l 20 local ID (sender) 0-9, + or spaces %r 20 remote ID (rcvr) 0-9, + or spaces %% 1 percent display % in header/ftr
contents.zh-CHS: 代码长度名称格式%a一周3天3个字符缩写%d 2日期01-31%m 2个月01-12%y 2年00-99%y 4年0000-9999%I 2 12小时01-12%h2 24小时00-23%m 2分钟00-59%S 2秒00-59%p2am/PM上午或下午%p2页码01-99%t2总页数01-99%l20本地ID（发件人）0-9，+或空格%r20远程ID（rcvr）0-9，+或空格%%1%显示在页眉/ftr中

contents.text: <rxpoll> provides the information necessary for a receive polling operation to occur. The object(s) to be received are defined by one or more <rcvobj> elements. The <rcvobj> is defined further under the child elements of <faxrcv>. The <rxpoll> element MAY also include a description of the header/footer that a media server SHOULD put on received pages. The <hdrfooter> element and its usage is described above.
contents.zh-CHS: <rxpoll>提供发生接收轮询操作所需的信息。要接收的对象由一个或多个<rcvobj>元素定义。<rcvobj>在<faxrcv>的子元素下进一步定义。<rxpoll>元素还可能包括媒体服务器应在接收到的页面上放置的页眉/页脚的描述。<hdrfooter>元素及其用法如上所述。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: rmtid: specifies the identifier of the remote fax terminal that is to be associated with a polling operation. A media server MUST NOT execute a polling operation unless the value of rmtid matches that of the connected remote machine. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: rmtid：指定要与轮询操作关联的远程传真终端的标识符。除非rmtid的值与连接的远程计算机的值匹配，否则媒体服务器不得执行轮询操作。强制性的

contents.text: 9.12.1.4. <faxstart>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.12.1.4. <faxstart>

contents.text: The <faxstart> element requests that an event be sent when fax operation has begun. When triggered, the following will be executed:
contents.zh-CHS: <faxstart>元素请求在传真操作开始时发送事件。触发时，将执行以下操作：

contents.text: <send target="source" event="fax.start"/>
9.12.1.5. <faxnegotiate>

The <faxnegotiate> element requests that an event be sent when a negotiation has been completed. Multiple events MAY be sent each time a Digital Command Signal (DCS) frame is sent or received. When triggered, the following will be executed:
contents.zh-CHS: 元素请求在协商完成时发送事件。每次发送或接收数字命令信号（DCS）帧时，可能会发送多个事件。触发时，将执行以下操作：

contents.text: <send target="source" event="fax.negotiate" namelist="fax.rmtid fax.rate fax.resolution fax.pagesize fax.encoding fax.ecm"/>
contents.zh-CHS: <send target=“source”event=“fax.negotiate”namelist=“fax.rmtid fax.rate fax.resolution fax.pagesize fax.encoding fax.ecm”/

contents.text: 9.12.1.6. <faxpagedone>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.12.1.6. <faxpagedone>

contents.text: The <faxpagedone> element requests that an event be sent when a page has been sent or received. When triggered, the following will be executed:
contents.zh-CHS: <faxpagedone>元素请求在发送或接收页面时发送事件。触发时，将执行以下操作：

contents.text: <send target="source" event="fax.pagedone" namelist="fax.resolution fax.pagesize fax.encoding fax.pagebadlines fax.resendcount"/>
contents.zh-CHS: <send target=“source”event=“fax.pagedone”namelist=“fax.resolution fax.pagesize fax.encoding fax.pagebadlines fax.resendcount”/

contents.text: 9.12.1.7. <faxobjectdone>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.12.1.7. <faxobjectdone>

contents.text: The <faxobjectdone> element requests that an event be sent when an objuri has been completed. When triggered, the following will be executed:
contents.zh-CHS: <faxobjectdone>元素请求在objuri完成时发送事件。触发时，将执行以下操作：

contents.text: <send target="source" event="fax.objectdone" namelist="fax.objuri fax.objbadlines fax.resendcount fax.totalpages fax.result"/>
contents.zh-CHS: <send target=“source”event=“fax.objectdone”namelist=“fax.objuri fax.objbadlines fax.resendcount fax.totalpages fax.result”/

contents.text: 9.12.1.8. <faxopcomplete>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.12.1.8. <faxopcomplete>

contents.text: The <faxopcomplete> element requests that an event be sent when an operation has been completed. When triggered, the following will be executed:
contents.zh-CHS: <faxopcomplete>元素请求在操作完成时发送事件。触发时，将执行以下操作：

contents.text: <send target="source" event="fax.opcomplete" namelist="fax.totalpages fax.opbadlines fax.resendcount fax.totalobjects fax.duration fax.result"/>
contents.zh-CHS: <send target=“source”event=“fax.opcomplete”namelist=“fax.totalpages fax.opbadlines fax.resendcount fax.totalobjects fax.duration fax.result”/>

contents.text: 9.12.1.9. <faxpollstarted>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.12.1.9. <faxpollstarted>

contents.text: The <faxpollstarted> element requests that an event be sent when a polling operation has started. When triggered, the following will be executed:
contents.zh-CHS: <faxpollstarted>元素请求在轮询操作启动时发送事件。触发时，将执行以下操作：

contents.text: <send target="source" event="fax.opcomplete" namelist="fax.rmtid fax.rate fax.resolution fax.pagesize fax.encoding fax.ecm"/>
contents.zh-CHS: <send target=“source”event=“fax.opcomplete”namelist=“fax.rmtid fax.rate fax.resolution fax.pagesize fax.encoding fax.ecm”/

contents.text: 9.12.2. <faxrcv>
contents.zh-CHS: 9.12.2. <faxrcv>

contents.text: The <faxrcv> primitive provides the functionality of a called fax terminal. Typically this type of operation is to receive pages. However, it can include sending pages instead of, or in addition to, receiving them. The fax objects to receive are defined by the <rcvobj> elements, described below.
contents.zh-CHS: <faxrcv>原语提供被调用传真终端的功能。通常这种类型的操作是接收页面。但是，它可以包括发送页面，而不是接收页面，或者除了接收页面之外。要接收的传真对象由<rcvobj>元素定义，如下所述。

contents.text: A media server SHOULD send pages as a polled terminal when the <txpoll> element is included as part of <faxrcv>. This element may be included in addition to, or instead of, the <rcvobj> element. One <rcvobj> or <txpoll> element must be present. When both are present, a media server SHOULD first receive pages and will then allow the other terminal to poll the media server, requesting pages.
contents.zh-CHS: 当<txpoll>元素作为<faxrcv>的一部分包含时，媒体服务器应作为轮询终端发送页面。该元素可包括在<rcvobj>元素之外，或代替<rcvobj>元素。必须存在一个<rcvobj>或<txpoll>元素。当两者都存在时，媒体服务器应首先接收页面，然后允许另一终端轮询媒体服务器，请求页面。

contents.text: Because fax is a distinct media type, the <faxrcv> primitive is not expected to interact with other primitives. Rather, it will interact using fax protocols with a remote fax terminal and will send
contents.zh-CHS: 由于传真是一种独特的媒体类型，<faxrcv>原语不应与其他原语交互。相反，它将使用传真协议与远程传真终端进行交互，并发送

contents.text: requested status events to its invoking environment. During fax operation, shadow variables are used to record the progress and parameters of the varying stages of fax operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 向其调用环境请求的状态事件。在传真操作期间，阴影变量用于记录传真操作不同阶段的进度和参数。

contents.text: Status events are requested by including one or more status request elements. These elements correspond to different stages or events in fax operation and cause predefined events to be sent to the invoking environment when they occur. Since the only recipient of these events is expected to be a fax control agent, requests are simplified by associating a predefined namelist of shadow variables with each event. This decision may be revisited to allowed tailored namelists based on further implementation experience. Status requests apply both to receiving and polling operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过包含一个或多个状态请求元素来请求状态事件。这些元素对应于传真操作中的不同阶段或事件，并导致预定义事件在发生时发送到调用环境。由于预期这些事件的唯一接收者是传真控制代理，因此通过将阴影变量的预定义名称列表与每个事件关联，可以简化请求。根据进一步的实施经验，可重新考虑该决定，以允许定制名单。状态请求同时适用于接收和轮询操作。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: id: an optional identifier that may be referenced elsewhere for sending events to the faxrecv primitive.
contents.zh-CHS: id：可选标识符，可在别处引用，用于向faxrecv原语发送事件。

contents.text: lclid: the identifier that a media server uses to identify itself.
contents.zh-CHS: lclid：媒体服务器用来标识自身的标识符。

contents.text: ecm: specifies whether ECM mode is allowed to be used if supported by the remote terminal. Defaults to "true".
contents.zh-CHS: ecm：指定如果远程终端支持，是否允许使用ecm模式。默认为“true”。

contents.text: Events:
contents.zh-CHS: 活动：

contents.text: terminate: terminates the fax reception operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 终止：终止传真接收操作。

contents.text: Shadow Variables:
contents.zh-CHS: 阴影变量：

contents.text: <faxrcv> supports the same set of shadow variables as <faxsend>
The following sections describe the child elements of <faxrcv>.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下各节介绍<faxrcv>的子元素。

contents.text: In addition to the elements defined below, <faxrcv> MAY also have the following child elements, which were defined under <faxsend>:
contents.zh-CHS: 除了下面定义的元素外，<faxrcv>还可能具有以下子元素，这些子元素是在<faxsend>下定义的：

contents.text:
o  <hdrfooter>
o  <faxstart>
o  <faxnegotiate>
o  <faxpagedone>
o  <faxobjectdone>
o  <faxopcomplete>
o  <faxpollstarted>
Their meaning and usage are the same as previously defined.
contents.zh-CHS: 它们的含义和用法与前面定义的相同。

contents.text: <rcvobj> is used to define fax objects that a media server will receive. There may be multiple instances of the element, which will be used in order.
contents.zh-CHS: <rcvobj>用于定义媒体服务器将接收的传真对象。该元素可能有多个实例，将按顺序使用。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: objuri: a URI that points to the location that a received image is to be stored. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: objuri：一个URI，指向接收到的图像要存储的位置。强制性的

contents.text: maxpages: the maximum number of pages that will be stored in objuri.
contents.zh-CHS: maxpages：将存储在objuri中的最大页数。

contents.text: <txpoll> provides the information for a polling operation to occur as part of a fax receive operation. An object or multiple objects to be sent may be supplied by one or more <sendobj> elements. In the event of multiple occurrences, a media server MUST select the <sendobj> element whose rmtid attribute matches that of the remote terminal.
contents.zh-CHS: <txpoll>提供作为传真接收操作的一部分进行轮询操作的信息。要发送的一个或多个对象可以由一个或多个<sendobj>元素提供。如果多次出现，媒体服务器必须选择rmtid属性与远程终端匹配的<sendobj>元素。

contents.text: The <sendobj> element was defined previously as a child element of <faxsend>. The <txpoll> element is extended with an rmtid attribute that specifies the identifier of the remote fax terminal and is used to select the specific <sendobj> to send.
contents.zh-CHS: 先前将<sendobj>元素定义为<faxsend>的子元素。<txpoll>元素使用rmtid属性进行扩展，该属性指定远程传真终端的标识符，并用于选择要发送的特定<sendobj>。

contents.text: A media server SHOULD put a header/footer on transmitted pages based on any <hdrfooter> element included as part of <txpoll>.
contents.zh-CHS: 媒体服务器应根据<txpoll>中包含的任何<hdrfooter>元素在传输的页面上放置页眉/页脚。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: rmtid: specifies the identifier of the remote fax terminal that is to be associated with a polling operation. A media server MUST NOT execute a polling operation unless the value of rmtid matches that of the connected remote machine. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: rmtid：指定要与轮询操作关联的远程传真终端的标识符。除非rmtid的值与连接的远程计算机的值匹配，否则媒体服务器不得执行轮询操作。强制性的

contents.text: 10. MSML Audit Package
contents.zh-CHS: 10. MSML审核包

contents.text: 10.1. MSML Audit Core Package
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1. MSML审核核心包

contents.text: This section describes the MSML Audit Core Package that MAY be implemented to support auditing services.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节描述了可用于支持审核服务的MSML审核核心包。

contents.text: Audit requests and results may vary based on the information being audited. The MSML Audit Core Package specifies the framework to send audit request, defines a state list, and builds audit results. The
contents.zh-CHS: 审核请求和结果可能因被审核的信息而异。MSML审核核心包指定发送审核请求的框架，定义状态列表，并生成审核结果。这个

contents.text: additional audit packages define package specific state lists and associated audit result content. The additional audit packages MUST be defined within the framework specified by the Audit Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 其他审核包定义特定于包的状态列表和关联的审核结果内容。附加审计包必须在审计核心包指定的框架内定义。

contents.text: The <audit> element is an optional child element of <msml>, which MAY be used by MSML clients to perform state auditing of current media resources allocated and in use by the media server. The requested state information is returned in an MSML response.
contents.zh-CHS: <audit>元素是<msml>的可选子元素，msml客户端可以使用它对媒体服务器分配和使用的当前媒体资源执行状态审核。请求的状态信息在MSML响应中返回。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: queryid: the identifier of the MSML object being queried by the MSML client. Mandatory. Supported object types: conference or connection. Wildcards are allowed.
contents.zh-CHS: queryid：MSML客户端正在查询的MSML对象的标识符。强制性的支持的对象类型：会议或连接。允许使用通配符。

contents.text: statelist: a list of one or more state parameters that are being queried. Optional. If not present, the media server SHOULD return the id of audited object only. Each object type may contain a set of states. If the "statelist" contains any state that does not match the audited object type, the request MUST be rejected.
contents.zh-CHS: statelist：正在查询的一个或多个状态参数的列表。可选择的如果不存在，则媒体服务器应仅返回已审核对象的id。每个对象类型可能包含一组状态。如果“statelist”包含与已审核对象类型不匹配的任何状态，则必须拒绝该请求。

contents.text: mark: in the case of an error, the value of the mark attribute from the last successfully executed element that included the mark attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: mark：如果出现错误，则为上次成功执行的包含mark属性的元素的mark属性值。

contents.text: State Parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态参数：

contents.text: The state parameter MUST be named using a dot-notation format "audit.X.a.b.c...", where X is the mandatory field that indicates the class name of the object (e.g., "conf" or "conn") and the "a.b.c..." is the optional field used to describe the actual name of the state parameter in a hierarchical manner. The wildcard "*" MAY be used as part of a state name; however, it MUST only be used in the last field of the dot-notation (e.g., "audit.conf.*" is valid, but "audit.conf.*.a" is invalid). When a wildcard is used, it is equivalent to querying all the states below the specified level. Each field (e.g., within "a.b.c...") will result in individual element names <a>, <b>, and <c> in the audit result to contain corresponding state value. The parent/child relationship between these elements follows the hierarchy of the state name (i.e., <c> is child element of <b>, and <b> is child element of <a>).
contents.zh-CHS: 状态参数必须使用点符号格式“audit.X.a.b.c…”命名，其中X是表示对象类名（例如，“conf”或“conn”）的必填字段，“a.b.c…”是用于以分层方式描述状态参数实际名称的可选字段。通配符“*”可以用作州名称的一部分；但是，它只能在点表示法的最后一个字段中使用（例如，“audit.conf.*”有效，但“audit.conf.*.a”无效）。使用通配符时，相当于查询指定级别以下的所有状态。每个字段（例如，“a.b.c.”内）将在审核结果中生成单个元素名<a>、<b>和<c>，以包含相应的状态值。这些元素之间的父/子关系遵循状态名称的层次结构（即，<c>是<b>的子元素，<b>是<a>的子元素）。

contents.text: 10.1.2. <auditresult>
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1.2. <auditresult>

contents.text: The <auditresult> element is an optional child element of <result>, which MUST be used by the media server to return the audit result. A specific instance of the <auditresult> element contains the state information of a single active object. Therefore, if multiple objects are within the scope of the audit request, then one <auditresult> element per object MUST be present. A zero occurrence of <auditresult> element indicates that there are no active resources within the scope of the audit request.
contents.zh-CHS: <auditresult>元素是<result>的可选子元素，媒体服务器必须使用它来返回审核结果。<auditresult>元素的特定实例包含单个活动对象的状态信息。因此，如果多个对象在审核请求的范围内，则每个对象必须有一个<auditresult>元素。<auditresult>元素的零表示审核请求范围内没有活动资源。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: targetid: the identifier of a conference or connection. Mandatory. Wildcard is not allowed.
contents.zh-CHS: targetid：会议或连接的标识符。强制性的不允许使用通配符。

contents.text: The <auditresult> may contain child element(s) that return additional state information, corresponding to the "statelist" attribute in the <audit> request. The child element names correspond to the fields of the state parameter name (e.g., "a.b.c..."), following the same hierarchical structure.
contents.zh-CHS: <auditresult>可能包含返回附加状态信息的子元素，对应于<audit>请求中的“statelist”属性。子元素名称对应于状态参数名称的字段（例如，“a.b.c…”），遵循相同的层次结构。

contents.text: 10.2. MSML Audit Conference Package
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2. MSML审核会议包

contents.text: This section describes the MSML Audit Conference Package that MUST be implemented to support auditing of conference services. The MSML Audit Conference Package follows the framework specified by the MSML Audit Core Package. This package defines the state parameter list and audit result for conference auditing.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍为支持会议服务的审核而必须实现的MSML审核会议包。MSML审核会议包遵循MSML审核核心包指定的框架。此包定义会议审核的状态参数列表和审核结果。

contents.text: 10.2.1. State Parameters
All conference state parameter names MUST be prefixed by "audit.conf".
contents.zh-CHS: 所有会议状态参数名称的前缀必须为“audit.conf”。

contents.text: confconfig: query the conferences general configuration.
contents.zh-CHS: confconfig：查询会议常规配置。

contents.text: confconfig.audiomix: query the audio mixer's general configuration in the conference.
contents.zh-CHS: confconfig.audiomix：在会议中查询音频混音器的常规配置。

contents.text: confconfig.audiomix.asn: query the current ASN setting in the audio mixer.
contents.zh-CHS: confconfig.audiomix.asn：查询音频混音器中的当前asn设置。

contents.text: confconfig.audiomix.n-loudest: query the current n-loudest setting in the audio mixer.
contents.zh-CHS: confconfig.audiomix.n-loadmost：查询音频混音器中当前的n-loadmost设置。

contents.text: confconfig.videolayout: query the video layout's general configuration in the conference.
contents.zh-CHS: confconfig.videolayout：在会议中查询视频版面的常规配置。

contents.text: confconfig.videolayout.root: query the root window setting of the video layout.
contents.zh-CHS: confconfig.videolayout.root：查询视频布局的根窗口设置。

contents.text: confconfig.videolayout.selector: query the video stream selector setting of the video layout.
contents.zh-CHS: confconfig.videolayout.selector：查询视频布局的视频流选择器设置。

contents.text: confconfig.controller: query who is the conference controller.
contents.zh-CHS: confconfig.controller：查询谁是会议控制器。

contents.text: dialog: query the active dialog information on the conference. See MSML Audit Dialog Package for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 对话框：查询会议上的活动对话框信息。有关详细信息，请参阅MSML审核对话框包。

contents.text: stream: query the active stream information on the conference. See MSML Audit Stream Package for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 流：查询会议的活动流信息。有关详细信息，请参阅MSML审核流包。

contents.text: 10.2.2. <auditresult>
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2. <auditresult>

contents.text: The <auditresult> attribute of "targetid" is required to indicate results for auditing a conference.
contents.zh-CHS: 需要“targetid”的<auditresult>属性来指示会议的审核结果。

contents.text: The <auditresult> element may optionally contain the following child elements, returning additional conference state information, if corresponding states are queried and available.
contents.zh-CHS: <auditresult>元素可以选择包含以下子元素，如果查询了相应的状态并且可用，则返回附加的会议状态信息。

contents.text: 10.2.2.1. confconfig
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2.1. confconfig

contents.text: The <confconfig> element is used to return the general configuration state(s) of a conference, using the following attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素用于使用以下属性返回会议的常规配置状态。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: deletewhen: as defined by <createconference> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: deletewhen：由MSML会议核心包中的<createconference>元素定义。

contents.text: term: as defined by <createconference> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 术语：由MSML会议核心包中的<createconference>元素定义。

contents.text: 10.2.2.2. confconfig.audiomix
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2.2. confconfig.audiomix

contents.text: The <audiomix> element contains the general audio mixer configuration using the following attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: <audiomix>元素包含使用以下属性的通用音频混音器配置。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: id: as defined by <audiomix> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: id：由MSML会议核心包中的<audiomix>元素定义。

contents.text: samplerate: as defined by <audiomix> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 采样器：由MSML会议核心包中的<audiomix>元素定义。

contents.text: 10.2.2.3. confconfig.audiomix.asn
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2.3. confconfig.audiomix.asn

contents.text: The <asn> element contains the current ASN setting of an audio mixer, if ASN is enabled. The state values are included in the following attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果启用了asn，<asn>元素包含音频混音器的当前asn设置。状态值包含在以下属性中。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: ri: as defined by <asn> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: ri：由MSML会议核心包中的<asn>元素定义。

contents.text: asth: as defined by <asn> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: ASH：由MSML会议核心包中的<asn>元素定义。

contents.text: 10.2.2.4. confconfig.audiomix.n-loudest
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2.4. confconfig.audiomix.n-最大音量

contents.text: The <n-loudest> element contains the current n-loudest setting of the audio mixer. The state values are included in the following attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: <n-loadmost>元素包含音频混音器的当前n-loadmost设置。状态值包含在以下属性中。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: n: as defined by <n-loudest> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: n：由MSML会议核心包中的<n-loadmost>元素定义。

contents.text: 10.2.2.5. confconfig.videolayout
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2.5. confconfig.videolayout

contents.text: The <videolayout> element contains the general video layout configuration using the following attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素包含使用以下属性的常规视频布局配置。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: id: as defined by <videolayout> in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: id：由MSML会议核心包中的<videolayout>定义。

contents.text: type: as defined by <videolayout> in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：由MSML会议核心包中的<videolayout>定义。

contents.text: 10.2.2.6. confconfig.videolayout.root
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2.6. confconfig.videolayout.root

contents.text: The <root> element is used to contain root window settings.
contents.zh-CHS: <root>元素用于包含根窗口设置。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: size: as defined by <root> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 大小：由MSML会议核心包中的<root>元素定义。

contents.text: backgroundcolor: as defined by <root> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 背景颜色：由MSML会议核心包中的<root>元素定义。

contents.text: Backgroundimage: as defined by <root> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 背景图像：由MSML会议核心包中的<root>元素定义。

contents.text: 10.2.2.7. confconfig.videolayout.selector
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2.7. confconfig.videolayout.selector

contents.text: The <selector> element is used to contain selector settings.
contents.zh-CHS: <selector>元素用于包含选择器设置。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: id: as defined by <selector> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: id：由MSML会议核心包中的<selector>元素定义。

contents.text: method: as defined by <selector> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 方法：由MSML会议核心包中的<selector>元素定义。

contents.text: status: as defined by <selector> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态：由MSML会议核心包中的<selector>元素定义。

contents.text: blankothers: as defined by <selector> element in MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: blankothers：由MSML会议核心包中的<selector>元素定义。

contents.text: si: as defined by <selector> element in MSML Conference Core Package when selector method is "vas".
contents.zh-CHS: si：当选择器方法为“vas”时，由MSML会议核心包中的<selector>元素定义。

contents.text: speakersees: as defined by <selector> element in MSML Conference Core Package when selector method is "vas".
contents.zh-CHS: speakersees：当选择器方法为“vas”时，由MSML会议核心包中的<selector>元素定义。

contents.text: 10.2.2.8. confconfig.controller
contents.zh-CHS: 10.2.2.8. confconfig.controller

contents.text: The <controller> element is used to return the conference controller id in its content. The conference controller is the SIP dialog that carries the <createconference> request. The return value is the MSML connection id.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素用于返回其内容中的会议控制器id。会议控制器是承载<createconference>请求的SIP对话框。返回值是MSML连接id。

contents.text: 10.2.2.9. dialog
If conference dialog state is queried, the audit result is returned using the <dialog> element as specified in the MSML Audit Dialog Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果查询会议对话框状态，将使用MSML audit dialog包中指定的<dialog>元素返回审核结果。

contents.text: If conference stream state is queried, the audit result is returned using the <stream> element as specified in the MSML Audit Stream Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果查询会议流状态，则使用MSML审核流包中指定的<stream>元素返回审核结果。

contents.text: 10.3. MSML Audit Connection Package
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3. MSML审核连接包

contents.text: This section describes the MSML Audit Connection Package that MAY be implemented to support auditing connection services. The MSML Audit Connection Package follows the framework specified by the MSML Audit Core Package. This package defines the state parameter list and audit result for connection auditing.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍了MSML审核连接包，该包可用于支持审核连接服务。MSML审核连接包遵循MSML审核核心包指定的框架。此包定义连接审核的状态参数列表和审核结果。

contents.text: 10.3.1. State Parameters
Connection state parameter names are prefixed by "audit.conn".
contents.zh-CHS: 连接状态参数名称的前缀为“audit.conn”。

contents.text: sipdialog: queries the identifier of the SIP dialog with which the connection is associated.
contents.zh-CHS: sipdialog：查询与连接关联的SIP对话框的标识符。

contents.text: sipdialog.localseq: queries one of the SIP dialog states - local sequence number.
contents.zh-CHS: sipdialog.localseq：查询SIP对话框状态之一-本地序列号。

contents.text: sipdialog.remoteseq: queries one of the SIP dialog states - remote sequence number.
contents.zh-CHS: sipdialog.remoteseq：查询SIP对话框状态之一-远程序列号。

contents.text: sipdialog.localURI: queries one of the SIP dialog states - local URI.
contents.zh-CHS: sipdialog.localURI：查询SIP对话框状态之一-本地URI。

contents.text: sipdialog.remoteURI: queries one of the SIP dialog states - remote URI.
contents.zh-CHS: sipdialog.remoteURI：查询SIP对话框状态之一-远程URI。

contents.text: sipdialog.remotetarget: queries one of the SIP dialog states - remote target.
contents.zh-CHS: sipdialog.remotetarget：查询SIP对话框状态之一-远程目标。

contents.text: sipdialog.routeset: queries one of the SIP dialog states - route set.
contents.zh-CHS: sipdialog.routeset：查询SIP对话框状态之一-路由集。

contents.text: localsdp: queries the local SDP body of the connection.
contents.zh-CHS: localsdp：查询连接的本地SDP主体。

contents.text: remotesdp: queries the remote SDP body of the connection.
contents.zh-CHS: remotesdp：查询连接的远程SDP主体。

contents.text: dialog: queries the active dialog information on the connection. See MSML Audit Dialog Package for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 对话框：查询有关连接的活动对话框信息。有关详细信息，请参阅MSML审核对话框包。

contents.text: stream: queries the active stream information on the connection. See MSML Audit Stream Package for details.
contents.zh-CHS: 流：查询连接上的活动流信息。有关详细信息，请参阅MSML审核流包。

contents.text: 10.3.2. <auditresult>
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2. <auditresult>

contents.text: The <auditresult> attribute "targetid" MUST specify a connection identifier for a connection result.
contents.zh-CHS: <auditresult>属性“targetid”必须为连接结果指定连接标识符。

contents.text: The <auditresult> element MAY contain the following child elements optionally to return additional connection state information if the corresponding states are queried and are available.
contents.zh-CHS: <auditresult>元素可以包含以下子元素，如果查询了相应的状态并且这些状态可用，则可以选择返回附加的连接状态信息。

contents.text: 10.3.2.1. sipdialog
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2.1. sipdialog

contents.text: The <sipdialog> element contains the associated SIP dialog information. The SIP dialog ID information is returned using the following attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素包含关联的SIP对话框信息。使用以下属性返回SIP对话框ID信息。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: callid: call-ID value as defined in [n1]. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: callid:[n1]中定义的调用ID值。强制性的

contents.text: localtag: local-tag value as defined in [n1]. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: localtag:[n1]中定义的本地标记值。强制性的

contents.text: remotetag: remote-tag value as defined in [n1]. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: remotetag:[n1]中定义的远程标记值。强制性的

contents.text: This element can contain the following child elements optionally to return additional SIP dialog state information to the client if the corresponding states are queried and available.
contents.zh-CHS: 此元素可以包含以下子元素（可选），以便在查询了相应的状态并可用时向客户端返回附加的SIP对话框状态信息。

contents.text: 10.3.2.2. sipdialog.localseq
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2.2. sipdialog.localseq

contents.text: The <localseq> element contains the local sequence number. The local sequence number is one of the SIP dialog states as defined in [n1].
contents.zh-CHS: <localseq>元素包含本地序列号。本地序列号是[n1]中定义的SIP对话状态之一。

contents.text: 10.3.2.3. sipdialog.remoteseq
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2.3. sipdialog.remoteseq

contents.text: The <remoteseq> element contains the remote sequence number. The remote sequence number is one of the SIP dialog states as defined in [n1].
contents.zh-CHS: <remoteseq>元素包含远程序列号。远程序列号是[n1]中定义的SIP对话框状态之一。

contents.text: 10.3.2.4. sipdialog.localuri
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2.4. sipdialog.localuri

contents.text: The <localuri> element contains the local URI value. The local URI is one of the SIP dialog states as defined in [n1].
contents.zh-CHS: <localuri>元素包含本地URI值。本地URI是[n1]中定义的SIP对话框状态之一。

contents.text: 10.3.2.5. sipdialog.remoteuri
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2.5. sipdialog.remoteuri

contents.text: The <remoteuri> element contains the remote URI value. The remote URI is one of the SIP dialog states as defined in [n1].
contents.zh-CHS: <remoteuri>元素包含远程URI值。远程URI是[n1]中定义的SIP对话框状态之一。

contents.text: 10.3.2.6. sipdialog.remotetarget
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2.6. sipdialog.remotetarget

contents.text: The <remotetarget> element contains the remote target value. The remote target is one of the SIP dialog states as defined in [n1].
contents.zh-CHS: <remotetarget>元素包含远程目标值。远程目标是[n1]中定义的SIP对话状态之一。

contents.text: 10.3.2.7. sipdialog.routeset
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2.7. sipdialog.routeset

contents.text: The <routeset> element contains the route-set value (an ordered list of URIs separated by comma). The route set is one of the SIP dialog states as defined in [n1].
contents.zh-CHS: <routeset>元素包含路由集值（由逗号分隔的URI的有序列表）。路由集是[n1]中定义的SIP对话框状态之一。

contents.text: 10.3.2.8. localsdp
The <localsdp> element contains the local SDP body.
contents.zh-CHS: <localsdp>元素包含本地SDP主体。

contents.text: 10.3.2.9. remotesdp
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3.2.9. remotesdp

contents.text: The <remotesdp> element contains the remote SDP body.
contents.zh-CHS: <remotesdp>元素包含远程SDP主体。

contents.text: If the connection dialog state is queried, the audit result returns the queried information using the <dialog> element, as specified in the MSML Audit Dialog Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果查询了连接对话框状态，则审核结果将使用MSML审核对话框包中指定的<dialog>元素返回查询的信息。

contents.text: If the connection stream state is queried, the audit result returns the queried information using the <stream> element, as specified in the MSML Audit Stream Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果查询了连接流状态，审计结果将使用MSML审计流包中指定的<stream>元素返回查询的信息。

contents.text: 10.4. MSML Audit Dialog Package
contents.zh-CHS: 10.4. MSML审核对话框包

contents.text: This section describes the MSML Audit Dialog Package that MAY be implemented to support auditing dialogs. The MSML Audit Dialog Package follows the framework specified by the MSML Audit Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍可用于支持审核对话框的MSML审核对话框包。MSML审核对话框包遵循MSML审核核心包指定的框架。

contents.text: The MSML Audit Dialog Package must be used together with either the MSML Audit Conference Package or MSML Audit Connection Package, since the dialogs are applicable to conferences or connections.
contents.zh-CHS: MSML审核对话框包必须与MSML审核会议包或MSML审核连接包一起使用，因为对话框适用于会议或连接。

contents.text: 10.4.1. State Parameters

Dialog state parameter names are prefixed by "dialog". Since this package must be used together with the MSML Audit Conference Package or MSML Audit Connection Package, the complete dialog state name must be prefixed by "audit.conf.dialog" or "audit.conn.dialog", depending on the context within which the dialog state is queried.
contents.zh-CHS: 对话框状态参数名称的前缀为“Dialog”。由于此程序包必须与MSML Audit会议程序包或MSML Audit连接程序包一起使用，因此完整的对话框状态名称必须以“Audit.conf.dialog”或“Audit.conn.dialog”作为前缀，具体取决于查询对话框状态的上下文。

contents.text: dialog: queries the number of active dialog(s) running on the target (a conference or connection); basic dialog information will be returned.
contents.zh-CHS: dialog：查询在目标（会议或连接）上运行的活动对话框的数量；将返回基本对话框信息。

contents.text: dialog.duration: queries the amount of time a dialog has been running.
contents.zh-CHS: dialog.duration：查询对话框运行的时间。

contents.text: dialog.primitive: queries the media primitive currently being executed by the dialog.
contents.zh-CHS: dialog.primitive：查询对话框当前正在执行的媒体原语。

contents.text: dialog.controller: queries the dialog controller.
contents.zh-CHS: dialog.controller：查询对话框控制器。

contents.text: 10.4.2. <dialog>
contents.zh-CHS: 10.4.2. <dialog>

contents.text: The <dialog> element is a child element of <auditresult>, which contains the active dialog information on the target identified by the attribute "targetid" of the <audioresult> element.
contents.zh-CHS: <dialog>元素是<auditresult>的子元素，它包含由<audioresult>元素的属性“targetid”标识的目标上的活动对话信息。

contents.text: Basic dialog information is returned using the following attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用以下属性返回基本对话框信息。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: src: as defined by the <dialogstart> element in the MSML Dialog Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: src：由MSML Dialog核心包中的<dialogstart>元素定义。

contents.text: type: as defined by the <dialogstart> element in the MSML Dialog Core Package. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 类型：由MSML Dialog核心包中的<dialogstart>元素定义。强制性的

contents.text: name: as defined by the <dialogstart> element in the MSML Dialog Core Package. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 名称：由MSML Dialog核心包中的<dialogstart>元素定义。强制性的

contents.text: This element may contain the following child elements optionally to return additional dialog information if the corresponding state parameter has been queried and the state value is available.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果查询了相应的状态参数且状态值可用，则此元素可以包含以下子元素（可选）以返回其他对话框信息。

contents.text: 10.4.2.1. <duration>
contents.zh-CHS: 10.4.2.1. <duration>

contents.text: The <duration> element returns the duration that a dialog has been running on the specified target. The duration value is included in the element content. It is a positive integer value (in unit of seconds).
contents.zh-CHS: 元素返回对话框在指定目标上运行的持续时间。持续时间值包含在元素内容中。它是一个正整数值（以秒为单位）。

contents.text: 10.4.2.2. <primitive>
contents.zh-CHS: 10.4.2.2. <primitive>

contents.text: The <primitive> element returns the currently active media primitive in its content. The active media primitive is the primitive that is currently being executed. Possible return values are play, dtmf, collect, dtmfgen, tonegen, record, or none.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素在其内容中返回当前活动的媒体原语。活动媒体原语是当前正在执行的原语。可能的返回值为play、dtmf、collect、dtmfgen、tonegen、record或none。

contents.text: 10.4.2.3. <controller>
contents.zh-CHS: 10.4.2.3. <controller>

contents.text: The <controller> element returns the dialog controller id in its content. The dialog controller is the SIP dialog that carries the <dialogstart> request. The returned value is the MSML connection id.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素在其内容中返回对话框控制器id。对话框控制器是承载<dialogstart>请求的SIP对话框。返回的值是MSML连接id。

contents.text: 10.5. MSML Audit Stream Package
contents.zh-CHS: 10.5. MSML审核流包

contents.text: This section describes the MSML Audit Stream Package that MAY be implemented to support auditing stream. The MSML Audit Stream Package follows the framework specified by the MSML Audit Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍可实现以支持审核流的MSML审核流包。MSML审核流包遵循MSML审核核心包指定的框架。

contents.text: The MSML Audit Stream Package MUST be used together with either the MSML Audit Conference Package or the MSML Audit Connection Package, since the stream is applicable between conferences, between connections, or between conferences and connections.
contents.zh-CHS: MSML审核流包必须与MSML审核会议包或MSML审核连接包一起使用，因为该流适用于会议之间、连接之间或会议与连接之间。

contents.text: 10.5.1. State Parameters

Stream state parameter names are prefixed by "stream". Since this package must be used together with the MSML Audit Conference Package or MSML Audit Connection Package, the complete stream state name must be prefixed by "audit.conf.stream" or "audit.conn.stream", depending on the context within which the stream state is queried.
contents.zh-CHS: 流状态参数名称的前缀为“Stream”。由于此包必须与MSML Audit Conference包或MSML Audit Connection包一起使用，因此完整的流状态名称必须以“Audit.conf.stream”或“Audit.conn.stream”作为前缀，具体取决于查询流状态的上下文。

contents.text: stream: queries the number of active streams created on the audited object; basic stream information will be returned.
contents.zh-CHS: 流：查询被审核对象上创建的活动流的数量；将返回基本流信息。

contents.text: stream.clamp: queries the clamping status.
contents.zh-CHS: stream.clamp：查询夹紧状态。

contents.text: stream.gain: queries the gain control information.
contents.zh-CHS: stream.gain：查询增益控制信息。

contents.text: stream.visual: queries the visual setting.
contents.zh-CHS: stream.visual：查询视觉设置。

contents.text: 10.5.2. <stream>
contents.zh-CHS: 10.5.2. <stream>

contents.text: The <stream> element is a child element of <auditresult> and contains the active stream information on the target identified by the attribute "targetid" of the <audioresult> element.
contents.zh-CHS: <stream>元素是<auditresult>的子元素，包含由<auditresult>元素的属性“targetid”标识的目标上的活动流信息。

contents.text: Basic stream information is returned using the following attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用以下属性返回基本流信息。

contents.text: Attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: 属性：

contents.text: joinwith: an identifier of either a connection or a conference with which the audited object is joined. Mandatory. Wildcard is not allowed.
contents.zh-CHS: joinwith：已审核对象加入的连接或会议的标识符。强制性的不允许使用通配符。

contents.text: media: as defined by the <stream> element in the MSML Conference Core Package. Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: 媒体：由MSML会议核心包中的<stream>元素定义。强制性的

contents.text: dir: direction of stream, from audited target perspective, "from" or "to". Mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: dir：流的方向，从审计目标的角度来看，“from”或“to”。强制性的

contents.text: compressed: as defined by the <stream> element in the MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩：由MSML会议核心包中的<stream>元素定义。

contents.text: display: as defined by the <stream> element in the MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 显示：由MSML会议核心包中的<stream>元素定义。

contents.text: override: as defined by the <stream> element in the MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 覆盖：由MSML会议核心包中的<stream>元素定义。

contents.text: preferred: as defined by the <stream> element in the MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 首选：由MSML会议核心包中的<stream>元素定义。

contents.text: This element MAY contain the following child elements that optionally return additional stream information, if the corresponding state parameter is queried and the state value is available.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果查询了相应的状态参数且状态值可用，则此元素可能包含以下子元素，这些子元素可以选择性地返回额外的流信息。

contents.text: The <clamp> element is included if stream clamping is active. The currently active clamping state values are returned using the attributes as defined by the <clamp> element in the MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果流箝位处于活动状态，则包含<climp>元素。使用MSML会议核心包中<clamp>元素定义的属性返回当前活动的夹紧状态值。

contents.text: The <gain> element is included if stream gain is active. The current gain control state values are returned using the attributes as defined by the <gain> element in the MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果流增益激活，则包含<gain>元素。使用MSML会议核心包中<gain>元素定义的属性返回当前增益控制状态值。

contents.text: The <visual> element is included if stream visual display is active. The current visual display settings are returned using the attributes as defined by the <visual> element in the MSML Conference Core Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果流视觉显示处于活动状态，则包含<visual>元素。使用MSML会议核心包中<visual>元素定义的属性返回当前视觉显示设置。

contents.text: 11. Response Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 响应代码

contents.text: Response codes are used to indicate reasons for failures as well as completion status. The appropriate code and description must be passed to the invoking environment on failure.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应代码用于指示故障原因以及完成状态。发生故障时，必须将适当的代码和描述传递给调用环境。

contents.text: The response codes defined in this section are returned as the value of the response attribute to the <result> element. Some values may also be returned as part of a namelist to an "msml.dialog.exit" event generated when an executing MSML dialog fails.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中定义的响应代码作为响应属性的值返回给<result>元素。某些值也可能作为名称列表的一部分返回给执行msml对话框失败时生成的“msml.dialog.exit”事件。

contents.text: Informational (1xx)
contents.zh-CHS: 信息（1xx）

contents.text: Reserved for future use
contents.zh-CHS: 留作将来使用

contents.text: Success (200)
200 OK
Request Error (4xx)
contents.zh-CHS: 请求错误（4xx）

contents.text: 400 Bad Request 401 Unknown Element 402 Unsupported Element 403 Missing mandatory element content 404 Forbidden element content 405 Invalid element content 406 Unknown attribute 407 Attribute not supported 408 Missing mandatory attribute 409 Forbidden attribute is present
contents.zh-CHS: 400错误请求401未知元素402不支持元素403缺少强制元素内容404禁止元素内容405无效元素内容406未知属性407属性不支持408缺少强制属性409禁止属性存在

contents.text: 410 Invalid attribute value
contents.zh-CHS: 410无效的属性值

contents.text: 420 Unsupported media description language 421 Unknown media description language 422 Ambiguous request (both URI and inline description) 423 External document fetch error 424 Syntax error in foreign language 425 Semantic error in foreign language 426 Unknown error executing foreign language
contents.zh-CHS: 420不支持的媒体描述语言421未知媒体描述语言422不明确请求（URI和内联描述）423外部文档获取错误424外语语法错误425外语语义错误426执行外语未知错误

contents.text: 430 Object does not exist 431 Object instance name already used 432 Conference name already in use 433 reserved 434 External document fetch error
contents.zh-CHS: 430对象不存在431对象实例名称已使用432会议名称已使用433保留434外部文档获取错误

contents.text: 440 Cannot join objects of the specified class 441 Objects have incompatible media types 442 reserved 443 reserved 444 Number of media inputs exceeded
contents.zh-CHS: 440无法连接指定类的对象441对象具有不兼容的媒体类型442保留443保留444超出媒体输入数

contents.text: 450 Objects have incompatible media formats 451 Incompatible media stream format
contents.zh-CHS: 450对象具有不兼容的媒体格式451不兼容的媒体流格式

contents.text: Server Error (5xx)
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器错误（5xx）

contents.text: 500 Internal media server error 503 Service Unavailable 510 Not in service 511 Service Unavailable 520 No resource to fulfill request 521 Internal limit exceeded
contents.zh-CHS: 500内部媒体服务器错误503服务不可用510不在服务中511服务不可用520没有资源来满足请求521超出内部限制

contents.text: 12. MSML Conference Examples
contents.zh-CHS: 12. MSML会议示例

contents.text: These examples focus on the MSML Conference Core Package used by a control agent (CA) to control services on a media server (MS). They show the relationship between SIP signaling to establish media sessions and MSML service control commands. For brevity, only the content of MSML messages is shown. The examples assumes that the CA and MS use the IPv4 address and UDP port number of the audio stream (on the MS) to identify the MSML connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些示例重点介绍由控制代理（CA）用于控制媒体服务器（MS）上的服务的MSML会议核心包。它们显示了建立媒体会话的SIP信令和MSML服务控制命令之间的关系。为简洁起见，仅显示MSML消息的内容。示例假定CA和MS使用音频流（在MS上）的IPv4地址和UDP端口号来标识MSML连接。

contents.text: 12.1. Establishing a Dial-In Conference
contents.zh-CHS: 12.1. 建立拨号会议

contents.text: Steps 1-3: establish an MSML control channel for the conference. Alternatively, a control channel could already have been established that was used for all CA/MS interactions. A control channel per conference is only one possible model. Currently, MSML uses SIP INFO requests and responses on this SIP dialog. There is a proposal to use this message exchange to establish a TCP channel for MSML similar to the approach used for the Media Resource Control Protocol v2 (MRCPv2). This approach would require that a request identifier be added to the <msml> element to correlate requests and responses. This currently relies on the SIP INFO request and response for this property. MSML messages are shown without specifying the transport in this example, but it assumes a request/response correlation based on transport messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤1-3：为会议建立MSML控制通道。或者，可能已经建立了用于所有CA/MS交互的控制通道。每个会议的控制通道只是一种可能的模式。目前，MSML在此SIP对话框上使用SIP信息请求和响应。建议使用此消息交换为MSML建立TCP通道，类似于媒体资源控制协议v2（MRCPv2）所用的方法。这种方法需要将请求标识符添加到<msml>元素中，以关联请求和响应。这当前依赖于此属性的SIP INFO请求和响应。在本例中，显示MSML消息时未指定传输，但它假定基于传输消息的请求/响应关联。

contents.text: Step 4: create a conference that will mix the loudest two speakers and report those speakers to the control agent every 10 seconds. The media server will automatically terminate remaining media sessions and delete the conference and associated resources and when the control channel is terminated.
contents.zh-CHS: 第4步：创建一个会议，该会议将混合最响亮的两个扬声器，并每10秒向控制代理报告这些扬声器。媒体服务器将自动终止剩余的媒体会话，并在控制频道终止时删除会议和相关资源。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <createconference name="exampleConf" deletewhen="nocontrol">
       <audiomix>
          <n-loudest n="3"/>
          <asn ri="10s"/>
       </audiomix>
   </createconference>
</msml>
Step 5: conference created successfully
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤5：成功创建会议

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <result response="200"/>
</msml>

Steps 6-11: standard 3PCC establishment of a user-initiated media session to a media server. This is the equivalent of a dial-in conference participant. The "To:" header returned by the MS in the 200 response of Step F8 was:
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤6-11：标准3PCC建立与媒体服务器的用户启动的媒体会话。这相当于拨号会议参与者。MS在步骤F8的200响应中返回的“To:”标题为：

contents.text: To: <sip:msml@ms.example.com>;tag=jd87dfg4h

Step 12: request an initial dialog with the participant to prompt for their name, desired conference, etc. The dialog completes by informing the participant that they are joining the conference. If this was not the first participant, the dialog could also announce the other participants.
contents.zh-CHS: 第12步：请求与参与者进行初始对话，以提示其姓名、所需会议等。该对话通过通知参与者他们将参加会议来完成。如果这不是第一个参与者，对话框还可以宣布其他参与者。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <dialogstart target="conn:jd87dfg4h" name="12345"
       type="application/vxml+xml"
       src="http://server.example.com/scripts/initial.vxml"/>
</msml>
Step 13: dialog started successfully. The dialog identifier is returned.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤13：对话框成功启动。将返回对话框标识符。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <result response="200"/>
   <dialogid>conn:jd87dfg4h/dialog:12345</dialogid>
</msml>
Step 14: sequence of HTTP VoiceXML dialog interactions.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤14：HTTP VoiceXML对话交互的顺序。

contents.text: Step 15: the VoiceXML browser exits (but does not disconnect). If a namelist had been specified within the VoiceXML <exit> element, it would have been included in the <event> sent to the CA.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤15：VoiceXML浏览器退出（但不断开连接）。如果在VoiceXML<exit>元素中指定了名称列表，那么它将包含在发送给CA的<event>中。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <event name="msml.dialog.exit"
          id="conn:jd87dfg4h/dialog:12345"/>
</msml>
Step 16: join the participant to the conference and have the volume of their contributing audio automatically adjusted to a target level of -20 dBm0.
contents.zh-CHS: 第16步：加入与会者的会议，并让他们的音频音量自动调整到-20 dBm0的目标水平。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <join id1="conn:jd87dfg4h" id2="conf:exampleConf">
      <stream media="audio" dir="from-id1">
          <gain agc="true" tgtlvl="-20"/>
      </stream>
      <stream media="audio" dir="to-id1"/>
</msml>
Step 17: successfully joined to conference
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤17：成功加入会议

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <result response="200"/>
</msml>
Steps 6 through 17 are repeated for the second participant.
contents.zh-CHS: 对第二个参与者重复步骤6至17。

contents.text: Step 18: play a join tone or message announcing the new participant to the conference.
contents.zh-CHS: 第18步：播放加入音调或消息，宣布新参与者加入会议。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <dialogstart target="conf:exampleConf"
       type="application/vxml+xml"
       src="http://server.example.com/scripts/joinmsg.vxml"/>
</msml>
Step 19: dialog started successfully. The dialog identifier is returned. The media server assigned a unique identifier since name attribute was not specified in <dialogstart>.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤19：对话框成功启动。将返回对话框标识符。由于未在<dialogstart>中指定名称属性，媒体服务器分配了唯一标识符。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <result response="200"/>
   <dialogid>conf:ExampleConf/dialog:j6fs8745</dialogid>
</msml>
Step 20: HTTP VoiceXML dialog interaction(s).
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤20：HTTP VoiceXML对话交互。

contents.text: Step 21: the VoiceXML browser exits.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤21：退出VoiceXML浏览器。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <event name="msml.dialog.exit"
          id="conf:ExampleConf/dialog:j6fs8745"/>
</msml>
Steps 6 through 21 are repeated for the third and subsequent participants.
contents.zh-CHS: 对第三个和后续参与者重复步骤6至21。

contents.text: 12.2. Example of a Sidebar Audio Conference
contents.zh-CHS: 12.2. 侧边栏音频会议示例

contents.text: This example assumes that a conference has already been established as in the previous example. It creates a sidebar conference that hears the main conference as a whisper. Three participants are moved to the sidebar. After some period of time, the sidebar participants are returned to the main conference and the sidebar is deleted.
contents.zh-CHS: 本例假设已建立会议，如前一例所示。它创建了一个侧边栏会议，以窃窃私语的方式听取主要会议。三名参与者被移动到侧边栏。一段时间后，侧边栏参与者返回主会议，侧边栏被删除。

contents.text: Step 1: the sidebar conference is created. It is joined half-duplex to the main conference and a manual gain object is inserted in the media stream. Three participants are then moved from the main conference to the sidebar. Although not shown, a CA could include the "mark" attribute in each element to allow recovery in the event of a mid- transaction error.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤1：创建侧栏会议。它半双工连接到主会议，并在媒体流中插入手动增益对象。然后将三名与会者从主会议移至侧边栏。尽管没有显示，CA可以在每个元素中包含“mark”属性，以允许在发生中间事务错误时进行恢复。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <createconference name="sidebarConf"
                     deletewhen="nomedia">
       <audiomix/>
   </createconference>
   <join id1="conf:sidebarConf" id2="conf:exampleConf">
       <stream media="audio" dir="to-id1">
           <gain amt="-20"/>
       </stream>
   </join>
   <unjoin id1="conn:gs5s4-1" id2="conf:exampleConf"/>
   <join id1="conn:gs5s4-1" id2="conf:sidebarConf"/>
   <unjoin id1="conn:hd764gr9-2" id2="conf:exampleConf"/>
   <join id1="conn:hd764gr9-2" id2="conf:sidebarConf"/>
   <unjoin id1="conn:h37frdvgs65-3" id2="conf:exampleConf"/>
   <join id1="conn:h37frdvgs65-3" id2="conf:sidebarConf"/>
</msml>
Step 2: sidebar conference created successfully and participants joined.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤2：侧边栏会议成功创建，参与者加入。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <result response="200"/>
</msml>

Step 3: once the sidebar conference has completed, the participants are rejoined to the main conference. The sidebar is destroyed automatically by the MS when the last media stream is removed as specified when the sidebar conference was created.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤3：侧边栏会议完成后，参与者将重新加入主会议。当创建侧栏会议时指定删除最后一个媒体流时，MS会自动销毁侧栏。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <unjoin id1="conn:gs5s4-1" id2="conf:sidebarConf"/>
   <join id1="conn:gs5s4-1" id2="conf:exampleConf"/>
   <unjoin id1="conn:hd764gr9-2" id2="conf:sidebarConf"/>
   <join id1="conn:hd764gr9-2" id2="conf:exampleConf"/>
   <unjoin id1="conn:h37frdvgs65-3" id2="conf:sidebarConf"/>
   <join id1="conn:h37frdvgs65-3" id2="conf:exampleConf"/>
</msml>
Step 4: participants successfully moved to main conference and sidebar destroyed.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤4：参与者成功移动到主会议，侧边栏被销毁。

contents.text:
<msml version="1.1">
   <result response="200"/>
</msml>
12.3. Example of Removing a Conference
contents.zh-CHS: 12.3. 删除会议的示例

contents.text: This example assumes a conference created similar to the first example where there is an MSML control channel specific to the conference and the conference has been configured to be deleted when that channel is removed (using SIP).
contents.zh-CHS: 此示例假设创建的会议与第一个示例类似，其中存在特定于该会议的MSML控制通道，并且该会议已配置为在移除该通道（使用SIP）时删除。

contents.text: Steps 1-2: the CA signals BYE for the SIP dialog used to establish the conference control channel.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤1-2：CA向用于建立会议控制通道的SIP对话框发送BYE信号。

contents.text: Steps 3-6: the MS initiates terminating the media sessions for each participant remaining in the conference.
contents.zh-CHS: 步骤3-6：MS发起人终止会议剩余每位参与者的媒体会话。

contents.text: The MS deletes the conference and removes all resources when the last participant has been removed.
contents.zh-CHS: 当最后一个参与者被删除时，MS将删除会议并删除所有资源。

contents.text: 12.4. Example of Modifying Video Layout
contents.zh-CHS: 12.4. 修改视频布局的示例

contents.text: Assume that a conference named "example" is created using the following mixer descriptions.
contents.zh-CHS: 假设使用以下混音器描述创建了一个名为“example”的会议。

contents.text:
<createconference name="quad-split">
   <audiomix>
      <n-loudest n="3"/>
      <asn ri="10s"/>
   </audiomix>
   <videolayout>
      <root size="CIF" background="white" />
      <selector id="default" method="vas" si="500ms">
         <region id="1" left="0" top="0" relativesize="1/4"/>
      </selector>
      <region id="2" left="50%" top="0" relativesize="1/4"/>
      <region id="3" left="0%" top="50%" relativesize="1/4">
      <region id="4" left="50%" top="50%" relativesize="1/4"/>
   </videolayout>
</createconference>
The following would change the size of the video window to QCIF and the background color to the default "black".
contents.zh-CHS: 下面将视频窗口的大小更改为QCIF，背景颜色更改为默认的“黑色”。

contents.text:
<modifyconference id="conf:example">
   <videolayout>
      <root size="4CIF"/>
   </videolayout>
</modifyconference>

The relative location of the regions does not change. However, the sizes of the regions do change because they are relative to the size of the root window. The result is a layout that looks identical but half the size.
contents.zh-CHS: 区域的相对位置不变。但是，区域的大小确实会发生变化，因为它们与根窗口的大小有关。结果是一个看起来相同但只有一半大小的布局。

contents.text: The following would freeze the video displayed in region "2" without affecting any other attributes of that region.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下操作将冻结区域“2”中显示的视频，而不会影响该区域的任何其他属性。

contents.text:
<modifyconference id="conf:example">
   <videolayout>
      <region id="2" left="50%" top="0" relativesize="1/4"
                     freeze="true"/>
   </videolayout>
</modifyconference>
13. MSML Dialog Examples
contents.zh-CHS: 13. MSML对话框示例

contents.text: These examples focus on the MSML Dialog Base Package and the MSML Dialog Group Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些示例侧重于MSML对话基本包和MSML对话组包。

contents.text: 13.1. Announcement

The following is a simple announcement scenario. Two recorded audio files are played in sequence followed by generated speech followed by a variable. The results are reported once media generation completes.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面是一个简单的发布场景。按顺序播放两个录制的音频文件，然后播放生成的语音，最后播放一个变量。一旦媒体生成完成，就会报告结果。

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<msml version="1.1">
   <dialogstart target="conn:12345" name="12345">
      <play>
         <audio uri="file://clip1.wav"/>
         <audio uri="http://host1/clip2.wav"/>
         <tts uri="http://host2/text.ssml"/>
         <var type="date" subtype="mdy" value="20030601"/>
      </play>
      <send target="source" event="done" namelist="play.amt
                                         play.end"/>
   </dialogstart>
</msml>
13.2. Voice Mail Retrieval
contents.zh-CHS: 13.2. 语音邮件检索

contents.text: Below is an example that shows a simple voice mail retrieval operation consisting of playing a message and allowing the user to pause and resume play using '5' to toggle the state. The operation would terminate when the play completed or the user entered '#'.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面的示例显示了一个简单的语音邮件检索操作，该操作包括播放消息，并允许用户使用“5”切换状态暂停并继续播放。播放完成或用户输入“#”后，操作将终止。

contents.text: During the play, the user can advance forward and backward through the message as well as rewinding to the beginning.
contents.zh-CHS: 在播放过程中，用户可以通过消息向前和向后移动，也可以倒带到开头。

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<msml version="1.1">
  <dialogstart target="conn:12345" name="12345">
   <group topology="parallel">
      <play>
         <audio uri="file://message.wav"/>
         <playexit>
            <send target="group" event="terminate"/>
         </playexit>
      </play>
      <dtmf iterate="forever">
         <pattern digits="5">
            <send target="play" event="toggle-state"/>
         </pattern>
         <pattern digits="6">
            <send target="play" event="forward"/>
         </pattern>
         <pattern digits="7">
            <send target="play" event="backward"/>
         </pattern>
         <pattern digits="8">
            <send target="play" event="restart"/>
         </pattern>
         <pattern digits="#">
            <send target="play" event="terminate"/>
         </pattern>
      </dtmf>
   </group>
 </dialogstart>
</msml>
13.3. Play and Record
contents.zh-CHS: 13.3. 播放和录制

contents.text: A more complex example is a play and record operation. This sources and sinks media and uses voice activity DTMF detection and recognition to influence behavior. Any DTMF input or voice activity will barge the play and cause the record to begin. However, if the prompt was barged with a DTMF digit of '#', the record terminates without starting. When the play terminates, it send a starttimer event to the VAD to allow it to recognize an initial silence condition. The recording will be terminated (without starting) when the VAD detects an initial 3 seconds of silence.
contents.zh-CHS: 一个更复杂的例子是播放和录制操作。这是媒体的源和汇，并使用语音活动DTMF检测和识别来影响行为。任何DTMF输入或语音活动都会干扰播放并导致录制开始。但是，如果提示被DTMF位“#”打断，则记录将终止而不启动。当播放终止时，它向VAD发送starttimer事件，以允许其识别初始静音条件。当VAD检测到最初3秒的静音时，记录将终止（不启动）。

contents.text: Once resumed (based upon voice detection), the recording may be terminated under several conditions. It will terminate after 5 seconds of silence or after 60 seconds elapses. It will also terminate if a '#' key is recognized. Every aspect of this behavior can be modified by changing what is recognized and the events that are sent. The following example uses the MSML Dialog Group Package.
contents.zh-CHS: Once resumed (based upon voice detection), the recording may be terminated under several conditions. It will terminate after 5 seconds of silence or after 60 seconds elapses. It will also terminate if a '#' key is recognized. Every aspect of this behavior can be modified by changing what is recognized and the events that are sent. The following example uses the MSML Dialog Group Package.translate error, please retry

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<msml  version="1.1">
 <dialogstart target="conn:12345" name="12345">
   <group topology="parallel">
      <play>
         <audio uri="file://prompt.wav"/>
         <playexit>
            <send target="vad" event="starttimer"/>
         </playexit>
      </play>
      <dtmf>
         <pattern digits="#">
            <send target="record" event="terminate.termkey"/>
         </pattern>
         <detect>
            <send target="play" event="terminate"/>
         </detect>
      </dtmf>
      <vad>
         <voice len="10ms">
            <send target="play" event="terminate"/>
            <send target="record" event="resume"/>
         </voice>
         <silence len="3s">
            <send target="record" event="nospeech"/>
         </silence>
         <tsilence len="5s">
            <send target="record" event="terminate.finalsilence"/>
         </tsilence>
      </vad>
      <record initial="suspend" maxtime="60s"
              dest="file://record.wav" format="g729">
         <recordexit>
            <send target="group" event="terminate"/>
         </recordexit>
      </record>
      <groupexit>
         <send target="source" event="done"
               namelist="record.len record.end"/>
      </groupexit>
   </group>
 </dialogstart>
</msml>
The following implements the same functionality, as described above, in using the MSML Dialog Base Package, using the <record> composite mechanism for the play and record operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 如下所述，在使用MSML Dialog基本包时，使用用于播放和录制操作的<record>复合机制，实现了相同的功能。

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<msml  version="1.1">
 <dialogstart target="conn:12345" name="12345">
   <record prespeech="3s" postspeech="5s" maxtime="60s" termkey="#"
              dest="file://record.wav" format="g729">
      <play barge="true">
         <audio uri="file://prompt.wav"/>
      </play>
      <recordexit>
         <send target="source" event="done"
               namelist="record.len record.end"/>
      </recordexit>
   </record>
 </dialogstart>
</msml>
13.4. Speech Recognition
contents.zh-CHS: 13.4. 语音识别

contents.text: The following simple example requests that a user speak the name of a city and returns the result.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面的简单示例要求用户说出城市名称并返回结果。

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<msml version="1.1">
 <dialogstart target="conn:12345" name="12345">
   <group topology="parallel">
      <play>
         <audio uri="file://prompt.wav"/>
      </play>
      <speech>
         <grammar version="1.0">
            <rule id="city" scope="public">
               <item>
                  <one-of>
                     <item>vancouver</item>
                     <item>new york</item>
                     <item>london</item>
                  </one-of>
               </item>
            </rule>
            <match>
               <send target="group" event="terminate"/>
            </match>
         </grammar>
         <noinput>
            <send target="group" event="terminate"/>
         </noinput>
         <nomatch>
            <send target="group" event="terminate"/>
         </nomatch>
      </speech>
      <groupexit>
         <send target="source" event="done"
                       namelist="speech.end speech.results"/>
      </groupexit>
   </group>
 </dialogstart>
</msml>
13.5. Play and Collect
contents.zh-CHS: 13.5. 玩和收集

contents.text: This example prompts a user to enter 4 DTMF digits terminated by the '#' key (represented by "xxxx#" below). The prompt will be barged and the user has 10 seconds to begin entering input or no input will be indicated.
contents.zh-CHS: 此示例提示用户输入以“#”键结尾的4位DTMF数字（以下用“xxxx#”表示）。提示将被打断，用户有10秒时间开始输入，否则将不显示输入。

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<msml version="1.1">
