contents.text: Audit Dialog functionality requires use of either the Audit Conf Package or the Audit Conn Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 审核对话框功能要求使用审核配置包或审核连接包。

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
           elementFormDefault="qualified"
           attributeFormDefault="unqualified">
 <xs:include schemaLocation="msml-audit-core-datatypes.xsd"/>
 <xs:element name="dialog" substitutionGroup="stateParameter">
  <xs:complexType>
   <xs:complexContent>
    <xs:extension base="stateParameterType">
     <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element name="duration" type="xs:positiveInteger"
                  minOccurs="0"/>
      <xs:element name="primitive" minOccurs="0">
       <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
         <xs:pattern value="play"/>
         <xs:pattern value="dtmf"/>
         <xs:pattern value="collect"/>
         <xs:pattern value="dtmfgen"/>
         <xs:pattern value="tonegen"/>
         <xs:pattern value="record"/>
         <xs:pattern value="none"/>
        </xs:restriction>
       </xs:simpleType>

</xs:element>
      <xs:element name="controller" type="connID.datatype"
                  minOccurs="0"/>
     </xs:sequence>
     <xs:attribute name="name" type="msmlInstanceID.datatype"
                   use="required"/>
     <xs:attribute name="src" type="xs:anyURI" use="optional"/>
     <xs:attribute name="type" type="dialogLanguage.datatype"
                   use="required"/>
    </xs:extension>
   </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
</xs:schema>
16.4.8. msml-audit-stream-datatypes.xsd
contents.zh-CHS: 16.4.8. msml-audit-stream-datatypes.xsd

contents.text: Audit Stream functionality requires use of either the Audit Conf Package or the Audit Conn Package.
contents.zh-CHS: 审计流功能要求使用审计配置包或审计连接包。

contents.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
           elementFormDefault="qualified"
           attributeFormDefault="unqualified">
 <xs:include schemaLocation="msml-audit-core-datatypes.xsd"/>
 <xs:element name="stream" substitutionGroup="stateParameter">
  <xs:complexType>
   <xs:complexContent>
    <xs:extension base="stateParameterType">
     <xs:all>
      <xs:element name="clamp" minOccurs="0">
       <xs:complexType>
        <xs:attribute name="dtmf" type="boolean.datatype"/>
        <xs:attribute name="tones" type="boolean.datatype"/>
       </xs:complexType>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element name="gain" minOccurs="0">
       <xs:complexType>
        <xs:attribute name="amt" use="optional">
         <xs:simpleType>
          <xs:restriction base="xs:integer">
           <xs:minInclusive value="-96"/>
           <xs:maxInclusive value="96"/>
          </xs:restriction>
         </xs:simpleType>
        </xs:attribute>
        <xs:attribute name="agc" type="boolean.datatype"/>
        <xs:attribute name="tgtlvl" use="optional">

<xs:simpleType>
          <xs:restriction base="xs:nonPositiveInteger">
           <xs:minInclusive value="-40"/>
           <xs:maxInclusive value="0"/>
          </xs:restriction>
         </xs:simpleType>
        </xs:attribute>
        <xs:attribute name="maxgain" default="10">
         <xs:simpleType>
          <xs:restriction base="xs:nonNegativeInteger">
           <xs:minInclusive value="0"/>
           <xs:maxInclusive value="40"/>
          </xs:restriction>
         </xs:simpleType>
        </xs:attribute>
       </xs:complexType>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element name="visual" minOccurs="0"/>
     </xs:all>
     <xs:attribute name="joinwith" type="independentID.datatype"
                   use="required"/>
     <xs:attribute name="media" use="required">
      <xs:simpleType>
       <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
        <xs:pattern value="audio"/>
        <xs:pattern value="video"/>
       </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
     </xs:attribute>
     <xs:attribute name="dir" use="required">
      <xs:simpleType>
       <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
        <xs:pattern value="from"/>
        <xs:pattern value="to"/>
       </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
     </xs:attribute>
     <xs:attribute name="compressed" type="boolean.datatype"/>
     <xs:attribute name="preferred" type="boolean.datatype"
                   default="false"/>
     <xs:attribute name="display" type="xs:string"/>
     <xs:attribute name="override" type="boolean.datatype"
                   default="false"/>
    </xs:extension>
   </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
</xs:schema>
17. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 17. 安全考虑

contents.text: MSML being an XML-based language, security considerations as defined by RFC 3023 [i2] are applicable.
contents.zh-CHS: MSML是一种基于XML的语言，RFC 3023[i2]定义的安全注意事项是适用的。

contents.text: Media server interfaces driven using MSML are under the explicit control of a SIP application server. SIP call legs are used to deliver XML-based MSML transactions to the media server. The security and integrity of MSML transactions, whenever required, SHOULD use sips: and TLS for encryption and authentication of the SIP control channel used to carry MSML payloads. Further information related to security, privacy, and integrity of MSML media types is described in the IANA Considerations section.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用MSML驱动的媒体服务器接口受SIP应用服务器的显式控制。SIP呼叫分支用于将基于XML的MSML事务传递到媒体服务器。在需要时，MSML事务的安全性和完整性应使用sips:和TLS对用于承载MSML有效负载的SIP控制通道进行加密和身份验证。有关MSML媒体类型的安全性、隐私性和完整性的更多信息，请参见IANA注意事项部分。

contents.text: Media streams, such as audio/video, MAY optionally be protected, encrypted/decrypted, and authenticated, utilizing Secure Real Time Protocol (SRTP), wherever media stream security is required. Media negotiation establishes the required level of security and is initiated by the clients, which is outside the scope of the control interface specified by MSML.
contents.zh-CHS: 在任何需要媒体流安全性的地方，可以选择性地利用安全实时协议（SRTP）对诸如音频/视频的媒体流进行保护、加密/解密和认证。媒体协商建立了所需的安全级别，并由客户端发起，这超出了MSML指定的控制接口的范围。

contents.text: 18. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 18. IANA考虑

contents.text: 18.1. IANA Registrations for 'application' MIME Media Type
contents.zh-CHS: 18.1. “应用程序”MIME媒体类型的IANA注册

contents.text: The following registrations have been made:
contents.zh-CHS: 已进行了以下登记：

contents.text: Type Name: "application"
contents.zh-CHS: 类型名称：“应用程序”

contents.text: Subtype names:
contents.zh-CHS: 子类型名称：

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.moml+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.moml+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-conf+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml conf+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-dialog+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml dialog+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-dialog-base+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: “application/vnd.radisys.msml dialog base+xml”，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-dialog-group+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: “application/vnd.radisys.msml对话框组+xml”，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-dialog-speech+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: “application/vnd.radisys.msml对话框语音+xml”，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-dialog-transform+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml dialog transform+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-dialog-fax-detect+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: '应用程序/vnd.radisys.msml对话框传真检测+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-dialog-fax-sendrecv+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml对话框fax sendrecv+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-audit+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml audit+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-audit-conf+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml audit conf+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-audit-conn+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml audit conn+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-audit-dialog+xml',
contents.zh-CHS: '应用程序/vnd.radisys.msml审核对话框+xml'，

contents.text: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml-audit-stream+xml'
contents.zh-CHS: 'application/vnd.radisys.msml审计流+xml'

contents.text: Required parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 所需参数：无

contents.text: Optional parameters: charset
contents.zh-CHS: 可选参数：字符集

contents.text: charset semantics as specified in RFC 3023 [i2] for "application/xml" media type.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 3023[i2]中为“application/xml”媒体类型指定的字符集语义。

contents.text: Encoding considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: 编码注意事项：

contents.text: As specified in RFC 3023 [i2].
contents.zh-CHS: 按照RFC 3023[i2]的规定。

contents.text: Security Considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: 安全考虑：

contents.text: Media types included in this section are XML based, and therefore security considerations as defined by RFC 3023 [i10] are applicable.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中包含的媒体类型是基于XML的，因此RFC 3023[i10]定义的安全注意事项是适用的。

contents.text: These media types do not contain active or executable content as the content itself merely provides control of the underlying media streams.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些媒体类型不包含活动或可执行内容，因为内容本身仅提供对底层媒体流的控制。

contents.text: Secure exchange of content associated with these media types for purposes of authentication and privacy, whenever applicable, shall require the establishment of a secure control channel using sips: and TLS.
contents.zh-CHS: 出于认证和隐私目的，与这些媒体类型相关的内容的安全交换（如适用）应要求使用sips:和TLS建立安全控制通道。

contents.text: Privacy and integrity of media content associated with these media types shall be considered when applications using these media types are exchanging personal information such as personal identification codes or conference access codes. Whenever such content is deemed to require secure transport and authentication, a secure channel using sips: and TLS MUST be used, as these media types themselves provide no such inherent mechanisms for security.
contents.zh-CHS: 当使用这些媒体类型的应用程序交换个人信息（如个人识别码或会议访问码）时，应考虑与这些媒体类型相关的媒体内容的隐私性和完整性。当此类内容被认为需要安全传输和认证时，必须使用使用sips:和TLS的安全通道，因为这些媒体类型本身不提供此类固有的安全机制。

contents.text: Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: As specified in RFC 3023 [i2] and as specified within this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 按照RFC 3023[i2]和本文件的规定。

contents.text: Published specification: RFC 5707
contents.zh-CHS: 已发布规范：RFC 5707

contents.zh-CHS: 这些媒体类型的预期应用程序：

contents.text: Multimedia Conferencing, Interactive Voice Response systems
contents.zh-CHS: 多媒体会议、交互式语音响应系统

contents.text: 18.2. IANA Registrations for 'text' MIME Media Type
contents.zh-CHS: 18.2. “文本”MIME媒体类型的IANA注册

contents.zh-CHS: 计划进行以下登记：

contents.text: 'text/vnd.radisys.msml-basic-layout'
contents.zh-CHS: “text/vnd.radisys.msml基本布局”

contents.text: Required parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 所需参数：无

contents.text: Optional parameters: charset
contents.zh-CHS: 可选参数：字符集

contents.text: charset semantics as specified in RFC 3023 [i2] for "text/xml" media type.
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 3023[i2]中为“text/xml”媒体类型指定的字符集语义。

contents.text: Encoding considerations: As specified in RFC 3023 [i2].
contents.zh-CHS: 编码注意事项：如RFC 3023[i2]所述。

contents.text: Security Considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: 安全考虑：

contents.text: Media types included in this section are XML based, and therefore security considerations as defined by RFC 3023 [i10] are applicable.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中包含的媒体类型是基于XML的，因此RFC 3023[i10]定义的安全注意事项是适用的。

contents.text: The media type defined in this section does not contain active or executable content. The media type defines only a visual layout scheme of a video conference. Establishment of active connections associated with the video conference are outside the scope of this media type.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中定义的媒体类型不包含活动或可执行内容。媒体类型仅定义视频会议的视觉布局方案。与视频会议相关的活动连接的建立不在此媒体类型的范围内。

contents.text: Since this media type only defines a visual layout scheme, with no reference or information about client connections or participants within the conference, privacy and integrity concerns are not applicable to this media type.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于此媒体类型仅定义视觉布局方案，没有关于会议内客户端连接或参与者的参考或信息，因此隐私和完整性问题不适用于此媒体类型。

contents.text: 18.3. URN Sub-Namespace Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 18.3. URN子命名空间注册

contents.text: The namespace URI for elements defined within this specification is a URN [i8]. It uses the namespace identifier 'ietf' defined by [i9] and extended by RFC 3688 [i10].
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范中定义的元素的名称空间URI是URN[i8]。它使用由[i9]定义并由RFC 3688[i10]扩展的名称空间标识符“ietf”。

contents.text: The following registrations of URN Sub-Namespaces are planned:
contents.zh-CHS: 计划注册以下URN子名称空间：

contents.text: XML namespace: urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msml
XML:
contents.zh-CHS: XML:

contents.text: BEGIN
contents.zh-CHS: 开始

contents.text: <?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML Basic 1.0//EN"
"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml-basic/xhtml-basic10.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
contents.zh-CHS: <head>

contents.text: <meta http-equiv="content-type"
contents.zh-CHS: <meta http equiv=“内容类型”

contents.text: content="text/html;charset=iso-8859-1"/>
<title>Media Server Markup Language Namespace</title>
</head>
<body>
contents.zh-CHS: <body>

contents.text: Namespace for Media Server Markup Language
urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:msml
See MSML RFC 5707
</body>
</html>
END
contents.zh-CHS: 终止
